Help:Node.title: Command Usage: teach
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: teach ; teach [skill] to [student]
EXAMPLE: teach ; teach eastern to punzel
Allows you to teach a skill. You must know how to teach. Your student must be worse than than you at the designated skill and must be willing to learn from you. You may teach between 1-10 students at a time, depending on how skilled you are at teaching; any individual student will have to spend approximately thirty minutes with you to have an opportunity to learn the skill. Type "teach" while teaching to see your current status.
SEE ALSO: assess, study
